I'm willing to offer $1,200,000 for it. This reflects the value I see in the product while also allowing me to stay within my budget.  What are your thoughts?", "product_price": 1200000}

* **Open-ended:** The message ends with an open-ended question, encouraging Alice to engage further and provide a response.
